document.full_text: the host of 'squawk on the street' and 'squawk box,' among other financial news programs, was known as a sharp-tongued, contentious interviewer.
document.title: mark haines, cnbc host and interviewer, dies at 65
lines_and_colors: the host of 'squawk on the street' and 'squawk box,' among other financial news programs, was known as a sharp-tongued, contentious interviewer.
